crimemappingdata 0.3.0

    Summary of available datasets Using crime data for teaching
  • Changelog

    Function reference

    Point-level crime data

    Datasets in which each row represents information about a single crime or incident, including information about the crime/incident location.

    aggravated_assaults
    Aggravated assaults in Austin in 2019
    bronx_shootings
    Shootings in the Bronx in 2019
    cdmx_car_jacking
    Car jackings in Mexico City
    chicago_aggravated_assaults
    Aggravated assaults in Chicago, 2010 to 2019
    cincinnati_burglary
    Burglaries in Cincinnati, 2016 to 2018
    czechia_collisions
    Drink/drug-related traffic collisions in Czechia
    czechia_mcycle_thefts
    Motorcycle thefts in Czechia
    downtown_homicides
    Homicides in downtown Atlanta in 2019
    glenrose_heights_homicides
    Homicides in Glenrose Heights in 2019
    hungerford_shootings
    Shootings in the Hungerford Massacre
    lancashire_asb
    Anti-social behaviour in Lancashire
    london_crimes
    Crimes in London
    medellin_homicides
    Medellin homicides
    northumbria_asb
    Anti-social behaviour in Northumbria
    nottingham_burglary
    Burglaries in Nottingham
    nottingham_robbery
    Robberies in Nottingham
    nyc_homicides
    Homicides in New York City, 2016 to 2018
    nyc_shootings
    Shootings in New York City in 2019
    san_francisco_robbery
    Personal robberies in San Francisco in 2019
    vancouver_thefts
    Thefts in Vancouver in 2020

    Area-level crime data

    Datasets in which each row represents the count of crimes or incidents in an area, often for use together with a supporting dataset of area boundaries.

    germany_violence_counts
    Count of violence in German states
    japan_violence_counts
    Counts of violent crime in Japan, 2012
    malaysia_violence_counts
    Violent crime counts in Malaysia, 2006 to 2017
    northants_burglary_counts
    Counts of burglary in Northamptonshire in 2020
    qld_stalking
    Stalking in Queensland from 2001 to 2022
    uttar_pradesh_murders
    Murders in Uttar Pradesh

    Supporting data

    Datasets to support the use of one or more of the crime datasets, often to enable teaching of specific techniques. Suggestions for combinations of crime and supporting datasets are included in the relevant pages below.

    cdmx_alcaldias
    Alcaldías (boroughs) of Mexico City
    chicago_police_districts
    Chicago Police Department Districts
    lancashire_districts
    Local authority districts of Lancashire
    lancashire_wards
    Local government wards of Lancashire
    lancashire_ward_pop
    Lancashire ward population
    medellin_metro_lines
    Metro and cable-car lines in Medellin
    medellin_metro_stns
    Metro and cable-car stations in Medellin
    northumbria_districts
    Local authority districts of Northumbria
    northumbria_wards
    Local government wards of Northumbria
    northumbria_ward_pop
    Northumbria ward population
    nottingham_wards
    Local government wards of Nottingham
    nyc_precincts
    New York City Police precinct boundaries
    qld_police_divisions
    Queensland Police Service division boundaries
    qld_population
    Population of Queensland Police Service divisions
    uttar_pradesh_districts
    Districts of Uttar Pradesh
    uttar_pradesh_population
    Population of districts in Uttar Pradesh
